title: Introducing Sufi Fakirs Of Bengal (Bauliana-Sufiana)
description:
This digital-download collection collection introduces six sufi and Baul/Hindu artists largely unheard outside India. It's a spellbinding trip into mystical art with a tender heart, showcased in poignant, centuries-old teaching songs about love, humanity and devotion. "Ayat Koran pore shudhu naam Thikana" by Akkas Fakir, entrances with its plaintive, echo-laden vocal and galloping tabla and tambourine rhythm. The Collection also features Arati Biswas, one of the renowned female Baul singer. 

===================================================================================

Track List:

01. Dil Kabate Tin Doroja - Noor Alam

02. Aj Mahafil, Kabar-E Nishana - Arman Fakir

03. Ayat Koran Pore Shudhu Naam Thikana - Akkas Fakir

04. Khajababa - Babu Fakir

05. Doyal Data Kebla Kaba - Akkas Fakir

06. Ay Boro Pir - Babu Fakir

07. Dillite Nijamuddin Aulia Elo - Arman Fakir

08. Ashraful Aulia - Arati Biswas

09. Ei Baganer Malik Jara - Golam Fakir

===================================================================================
